query.statement:
SELECT CS122C.CHK, CS122C.FLAG, CS122C.UPN, CS122C.CST, CS122C.PJT, CS122C.HNO, CS122C.SEQ, CS122C.BSU, CS122C.BSU_NM, CS122C.FSD, CS122C.CCG, CS122C.EXP, CS122C.CS2, CS122C.IS2, CS122C.BPM, CS122C.HNA, CS122C.ZSPEC, CS122C.ZSPEC1, CS122C.ZSPEC2, CASE WHEN DECODE(CS122C.ZSPEC3, '' , 0, CS122C.ZSPEC3) > 0 THEN DECODE(CS122C.ZSPEC3, '' , 0, CS122C.ZSPEC3) ELSE 60 END ZSPEC3, CS122C.USD, CS122C.ADT, CS122C.UGS, CS122C.UMR, -- CS122C.UMS, CS122C.UHJ, CS122C.GKD, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CAST(#G_MANDT# AS VARCHAR(3)),'CS130',CS122C.GKD) GKD_NM, '' T_GKD, CS122C.BGB, CS122C.RIV BJG, CS122C.RDT TIS, CS122C.JKH, CS122C.YYB, CS122C.ZER, CS122C.SLA, CS122C.SLR, CS122C.CYN, CS122C.CTP, CS122C.ETC, CS122C.ETCBG, CS122C.CSE, CS122C.RMK, CS122C.AMT, CS122C.VAT, CS122C.TOT, CS122C.AMBT, CS122C.VABT, CS122C.TOBT, CS122C.AMTT, CS122C.VATT, CS122C.TOTT, CS122C.HMT, --HRTS CS122C.DMT, --DI-PBX CS122C.ACMT, -- 공기청정기 추가 2020.08.11 Han JH CS122C.HYN, --HRTS CS122C.HEP, --HRTS CS122C.DYN, --DI-PBX CS122C.DND, --DI-PBX CS122C.DCE, --DI-PBX CS122C.ACYN, -- 공기청정기 추가 2020.08.11 Han JH CS122C.ACND, -- 공기청정기 추가 2020.08.11 Han JH CS122C.ARA, CS122C.ARA_NM, CS122C.HTY, CS122C.AGB, CS122C.AGB_NM, CS122C.ABG, CS122C.ABG_NM, CS122C.RGB, CS122C.KND_YN, CS122C.KND, CS122C.KND_NM, CS122C.IYN, CS122C.GBM, CS122C.GND, CS122C.PST, CS122C.JUJ, CS122C.BUJ, CS122C.RTO, CS122C.JUJ_NM, CS122C.BUJ_NM, MAX(CS122C.MCHK) MCHK, CS122C.FMY, CS122C.FMS, CS122C.CRS, (SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CODE1 = 'CS180' AND CODE2 = CS122C.CRS AND LANG = #G_LANG#) CRS_NM, '' PRO, '' TYP, '' GYB, '' CGB, '' UMS, '' MMN, -- '' UHJ, '' GBN, '' WYB, '' WIL, '' REQ, '' BHD, '' MYT, '' SQL_FLAG, '' MANDT, '2' CHK_QUERY, '' MAXSEQ, CS122C.HWR, CS122C.CFG, CS122C.SID, CS122C.ZMAN, 'C' CBN, 0 DIF, (SELECT USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND USERNUMB = CS122C.SID ) SNAME, CS122C.VKGRP, CS122C.BSUGB, CASE WHEN INT(CS122C.ZSPEC7) > 0 THEN INT(CS122C.ZSPEC7) ELSE 15 END ZSPEC7, CS122C.ZSPEC12, CASE WHEN CS122C.BLD > '' THEN CS122C.BLD ELSE '13' END BLD, CASE WHEN CS122C.FDT = '99991231' THEN 20 WHEN (ROUND(SAPHEE.GET_DAYS(CS122C.FDT,HEX(CURRENT DATE))/365,0) + 1) > 0 AND (ROUND(SAPHEE.GET_DAYS(CS122C.FDT,HEX(CURRENT DATE))/365,0) + 1) <= 20 THEN (ROUND(SAPHEE.GET_DAYS(CS122C.FDT,HEX(CURRENT DATE))/365,0) + 1) ELSE 20 END FDT, CS122C.FHG, (SELECT VALUE(MAX(A.VALUE),'') FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 A WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.HOGI = CS122C.PJT || CS122C.HNO AND CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ACD2') ACD, CS122C.LTC, CS122C.LTY, CS122C.LTS, CS122C.FCM, CS122C.USD RGS, --계약개시일/유상개시일 다른경우 CS122C.UMR RMR, CS122C.DNO DNO, '' APSTAT, '' DAT, 0 AS P10, 0 AS F10, VALUE(STDAMT,0) AS STDAMT, VALUE(PREAMT,0) AS PREAMT, VALUE(TRT,0) AS TRT, CS122C.BDGBN AS BDGBN FROM ( SELECT CS122B.CHK, CS122B.FLAG, CS122B.UPN, CS122B.CST, CS122B.PJT, CS122B.HNO, CS122B.SEQ, CS122B.BSU, CS122B.BSU_NM, CS122B.FSD, CS122B.CCG, CS122B.EXP, CS122B.CS2, CS122B.IS2, CS122B.BPM, CS122B.HNA, CS122B.ZSPEC, CS122B.ZSPEC1, CS122B.ZSPEC2, CS122B.ZSPEC3, CS122B.USD, CS122B.ADT, CS122B.UGS, CS122B.UMR, CS122B.UHJ, -- CS122B.UMS, CS122B.GKD, CS122B.BGB, CS122B.RIV, CS122B.RDT, CS122B.JKH, CS122B.YYB, CS122B.ZER, CS122B.SLA, CS122B.SLR, CS122B.CYN, CS122B.CTP, CS122B.ETC, CS122B.ETCBG, CS122B.CSE, CS122B.RMK, CS122B.AMT, CS122B.VAT, CS122B.TOT, CS122B.AMBT, CS122B.VABT, CS122B.TOBT, CS122B.AMTT, CS122B.VATT, CS122B.TOTT, CS122B.HMT, --HRTS CS122B.DMT, --DI-PBX CS122B.ACMT, --공기청정기 CASE WHEN CS122B.HYN = 'Y' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END HYN, --HRTS CS122B.HEP, --HRTS CASE WHEN CS122B.DYN = 'Y' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END DYN, --DI-PBX CS122B.DND, --DI-PBX CASE WHEN CS122B.DCE = 'Y' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END DCE, --DI-PBX CASE WHEN CS122B.ACYN = 'Y' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END ACYN, -- 공기청정기 추가 2020.08.11 Han JH CS122B.ACND, -- 공기청정기 추가 2020.08.11 Han JH CS122B.ARA, CS122B.ARA_NM, CASE WHEN CS122B.USD <> '' THEN CS122B.HTY1 ELSE CS122B.HTY2 END HTY, CS122B.AGB2 AGB, CS122B.AGB_NM2 AGB_NM, CS122B.ABG2 ABG, CS122B.ABG_NM2 ABG_NM, CASE WHEN CS122B.RGB = 'Y' OR SUBSTR(CS122B.HNO,1,1) = 'J' OR SUBSTR(CS122B.HNO,1,1) = 'G' OR SUBSTR(CS122B.HNO,1,1) = 'S' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END RGB, CASE WHEN CS122B.KND > '' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END KND_YN, CS122B.KND, CS122B.KND_NM, CASE WHEN CS122B.IYN = 'Y' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END IYN, CS122B.GBM, CS122B.GND, CS122B.PST, CS122B.JUJ, CS122B.BUJ, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(CS122B.HNO,1,1) = 'J' THEN 60 WHEN SUBSTR(CS122B.HNO,1,1) = 'G' THEN 0 WHEN SUBSTR(CS122B.HNO,1,1) = 'S' THEN 60 ELSE CS122B.RTO END RTO, CS122B.JUJ_NM, CS122B.BUJ_NM, CS122B.FMY, CS122B.FMS, CS122B.CRS, CS122B.HWR, CS122B.CFG, CS122B.SID, CS122B.ZMAN, CS122B.CBN, CASE WHEN CS122B.LTC = 'Y' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END LTC, CS122B.VKGRP, CS122B.BSUGB, CS122B.ZSPEC7, CS122B.ZSPEC12, CS122B.BLD, CASE WHEN LENGTH(TRIM(CS122B.FDT)) <> 8 THEN '99991231' ELSE CS122B.FDT END FDT, CS122B.FHG, CS122B.LTY, CS122B.LTS, CS122B.FCM, CS122B.RGS, CS122B.RMR, CS122B.DNO, CS122B.STDAMT, CS122B.PREAMT, CS122B.TRT, CS122B.BDGBN,
CASE WHEN CS122B.MPT > #USD# OR CS122B.MYT > #USD# THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END MCHK
'N' MCHK
FROM ( SELECT '1' CHK, '' FLAG, CS122A.CS122_UPN UPN, CS122A.CS122_CST CST, CS122A.CS122_PJT PJT, CS122A.CS122_HNO HNO, CS126D.SEQ, CS111A.BSU, MM005B.NAME1 BSU_NM, CS111A.FSD, CS111A.EXP, CS111A.CS2, CS111A.IS2, CS111A.BPM, CS111A.MPT, CS111A.MYT, CS111A.CCG, CS101A.CS101_HNA HNA, MASTER02A.ZSPEC2, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(CS122A.CS122_HNO,1,1) = 'G' THEN MASTER02A.ZSPEC10 WHEN SUBSTR(CS122A.CS122_HNO,1,1) = 'J' THEN MASTER02A.ZSPEC9 ELSE '0' END ZSPEC, MASTER02A.ZSPEC1, MASTER02A.ZSPEC3, CS126D.USD, CS126D.ADT, CS126D.UGS, CS126D.UMR, CS126D.UHJ, CS126D.UMS, CS126D.GKD, CS121A.CS121_BGB BGB, CS121A.CS121_RIV RIV, CS121A.CS121_RDT RDT, CS126D.JKH, CS126D.YYB, CS121A.CS121_JZR ZER, CS126D.SLA, CS126D.SLR, CS126D.CYN, CS126D.CTP, CS126D.ETC, CS126D.ETCBG, CS126D.CSE, CS126D.RMK, CS126D.AMT, CS126D.VAT, CS126D.TOT, CS126D.AMBT, CS126D.VABT, CS126D.TOBT, CS126D.AMTT, CS126D.VATT, CS126D.TOTT, CS126D.HMT, --HRTS CS126D.DMT, --DI-PBX CS126D.ACMT, -- 공기청정기 CS126D.HYN, --HRTS CS126D.HEP, --HRTS CS126D.DYN, --DI-PBX CS126D.DND, --DI-PBX CS126D.DCE, --DI-PBX CS126D.ACYN,--공기청정기 CS126D.ACND,--공기청정기 CS101A.CS101_ARA ARA, MM028D.CTEXT2 ARA_NM, CS126D.HTY HTY1, CASE WHEN DECODE(MASTER02A.ZSPEC3, '' , 0, MASTER02A.ZSPEC3) >= INT(MM028G.CTEXT2) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END HTY2, CS126D.AGB AGB1, CS126D.AGB_NM AGB_NM1, CS101A.CS101_AGB AGB2, MM028E.CTEXT2 AGB_NM2, CS126D.ABG ABG1, CS126D.ABG_NM ABG_NM1, CS101A.CS101_ABG ABG2, MM028F.CTEXT2 ABG_NM2, CS126D.RGB, CS126D.KND, CS126D.KND_NM, CS126D.IYN, CS126D.GBM, CS126D.GND, CS126D.PST, CS111A.JUJ, CS111A.BUJ, VALUE(CS126D.RTO, 0) RTO, TBCSB1A.CCSB1EPN JUJ_NM, TBCSB1B.CCSB1EPN BUJ_NM, CS126D.FMY, CS126D.FMS, CS126D.CRS, CS126D.HWR, CS126D.CFG, CS126D.SID, CS126D.ZMAN, CS126D.CBN, WB010A.VKGRP, WB010A.BSU_GB BSUGB, MASTER02A.ZSPEC7, MASTER02A.ZSPEC12, CS111A.BLD, CS111A.FDT, CS126D.FHG, CS126D.LTC, CS126D.LTY, CS126D.LTS, CS126D.FCM, CS126D.RGS, CS126D.RMR, CS126D.DNO, CS126D.STDAMT, CS126D.PREAMT, CS126D.TRT, CS126D.BDGBN FROM SAPHEE.ZCST122 CS122A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS126C.MANDT, CS126C.CS126_UPN UPN, CS126C.CS126_CST CST, CS126C.CS126_PJT PJT, CS126C.CS126_HNO HNO, CS126C.CS126_SEQ SEQ, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_USD,'') USD, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_ADT,'') ADT, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_UGS,'') UGS, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_UMR,'') UMR, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_UHJ,'') UHJ, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_UMS, 0) UMS, CS126C.CS126_GKD GKD, CS126C.CS126_JKH JKH, CS126C.CS126_YYB YYB, CS126C.CS126_ZER ZER, CS126C.CS126_SLA SLA, CS126C.CS126_SLR SLR, CASE WHEN VALUE(CS126C.CS126_CYN, '') = '' THEN 'N' WHEN VALUE(CS126C.CS126_CYN, '') = 'N' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END CYN, CS126C.CS126_CTP CTP, CS126C.CS126_ETC ETC, CS126C.CS126_ETCBG ETCBG, CASE WHEN VALUE(CS126C.CS126_CSE, '') = '' THEN 'N' WHEN VALUE(CS126C.CS126_CSE, '') = 'N' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END CSE, CS126C.CS126_RMK1||CS126C.CS126_RMK2 RMK, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_AMT,0) AMT, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_VAT,0) VAT, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_TOT,0) TOT, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_AMBT,0) AMBT, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_VABT,0) VABT, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_TOBT,0) TOBT, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_AMT,0) + COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_AMBT,0) AMTT, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_VAT,0) + COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_VABT,0) VATT, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_TOT,0) + COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_TOBT,0) TOTT, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_HMT,0) HMT, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_DMT,0) DMT, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_ACMT,0) ACMT, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_HYN,'N') HYN, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_HEP,'') HEP, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_DYN,'N') DYN, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_DND,'') DND, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_DCE,'N') DCE, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_ACYN,'N') ACYN, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_ACND,'') ACND, CS126C.CS126_HTY HTY, CS126C.CS126_AGB AGB, MM028A.CTEXT2 AGB_NM, CS126C.CS126_ABG ABG, MM028B.CTEXT2 ABG_NM, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_RGB,'') RGB, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_KND,'') KND, COALESCE(MM028C.CTEXT2,'') KND_NM, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_IYN,'') IYN, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_GBM,'') GBM, CS126C.CS126_GND GND, CS126C.CS126_PST PST, CS126C.CS126_RTO RTO, '' JUJ, '' BUJ, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_FMY,'') FMY, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_FMS,'') FMS, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_CRS,'') CRS, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_HWR,'') HWR, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_CFG,'') CFG, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_SID,'') SID, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_ZMAN,'') ZMAN, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_GBN,'') CBN, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_FHG,'') FHG, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_LTC,'') LTC, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_LTY,'') LTY, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_LTS,'') LTS, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_FCM,'') FCM, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_RGS,'') RGS, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_RMR,'') RMR, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_DNO,'') DNO, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_STDAMT,0) STDAMT, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_PREAMT,0) PREAMT, COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_TRT,0) TRT, DECODE(COALESCE(CS126C.CS126_BDGBN,''),'X','1','') BDGBN FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 CS126C LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028C ON MM028C.CODE1 = 'CS129' AND CS126C.MANDT = MM028C.MANDT AND CS126C.CS126_KND = MM028C.CODE2 AND MM028C.LANG = #G_LANG#, ( SELECT CS126J.MANDT, CS126J.UPN, CS126J.CST, CS126J.PJT, CS126J.HNO, CS126J.SEQ FROM ( SELECT CS126E.MANDT, CS126E.CS126_UPN UPN, CS126E.CS126_CST CST, CS126E.CS126_PJT PJT, CS126E.CS126_HNO HNO, CS126E.CS126_UHJ UHJ, CS126E.CS126_SEQ SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 CS126E WHERE CS126E.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126E.CS126_UPN = #UPN# AND CS126E.CS126_CST = #CST#
AND CS126E.CS126_ARA = #ARA#
AND CS126E.CS126_GND = 'D' AND CS126E.CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126E.CS126_UHJ BETWEEN #UHJ_FM# AND #UHJ_TO# ) CS126J, ( SELECT CS126F.MANDT, CS126F.CS126_UPN UPN, CS126F.CS126_CST CST, CS126F.CS126_PJT PJT, CS126F.CS126_HNO HNO, CS126F.CS126_SEQ SEQ, CS126F.CS126_USD USD FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 CS126F, ( SELECT CS126A.MANDT, CS126A.CS126_UPN UPN, CS126A.CS126_CST CST, CS126A.CS126_GNO GNO FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 CS126A WHERE CS126A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126A.CS126_UPN = #UPN# AND CS126A.CS126_CST = #CST#
AND CS126A.CS126_ARA = #ARA#
AND CS126A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND CS126A.CS126_DDT = '' GROUP BY CS126A.MANDT, CS126A.CS126_UPN, CS126A.CS126_CST, CS126A.CS126_GNO ) CS126B WHERE CS126F.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126F.MANDT = CS126B.MANDT AND CS126F.CS126_UPN = CS126B.UPN AND CS126F.CS126_CST = CS126B.CST AND CS126F.CS126_GNO = CS126B.GNO ) CS126G WHERE CS126J.MANDT = CS126G.MANDT AND CS126J.UPN = CS126G.UPN AND CS126J.CST = CS126G.CST AND CS126J.PJT = CS126G.PJT AND CS126J.HNO = CS126G.HNO AND CS126J.SEQ = CS126G.SEQ AND CS126J.UHJ >= CS126G.USD ) CS126H, SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028A, SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028B WHERE CS126C.MANDT = CS126H.MANDT AND CS126C.MANDT = MM028A.MANDT AND CS126C.MANDT = MM028B.MANDT AND CS126C.CS126_UPN = CS126H.UPN AND CS126C.CS126_CST = CS126H.CST AND CS126C.CS126_PJT = CS126H.PJT AND CS126C.CS126_HNO = CS126H.HNO AND CS126C.CS126_SEQ = CS126H.SEQ AND CS126C.CS126_AGB = MM028A.CODE2 AND CS126C.CS126_ABG = MM028B.CODE2 AND MM028A.CODE1 = 'CS116' AND MM028B.CODE1 = 'CS112' AND MM028A.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028B.LANG = #G_LANG# ) CS126D ON CS126D.MANDT = CS122A.MANDT AND CS126D.UPN = CS122A.CS122_UPN AND CS126D.CST = CS122A.CS122_CST AND CS126D.PJT = CS122A.CS122_PJT AND CS126D.HNO = CS122A.CS122_HNO, SAPHEE.ZCST111 CS111A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MANDT, CCSB1EMP, CCSB1EPN FROM SAPHEE.ZTBCSB1 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CCSB1RTD = '' ) TBCSB1A ON TBCSB1A.MANDT = CS111A.MANDT AND TBCSB1A.CCSB1EMP = CS111A.JUJ LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MANDT, CCSB1EMP, CCSB1EPN FROM SAPHEE.ZTBCSB1 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CCSB1RTD = '' ) TBCSB1B ON TBCSB1B.MANDT = CS111A.MANDT AND TBCSB1B.CCSB1EMP = CS111A.BUJ LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MM005A.MANDT, MM005A.LGORT, MM005A.LIFNR, MM012A.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT005 MM005A, SAPHEE.ZMMT012 MM012A WHERE MM005A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM005A.MANDT = MM012A.MANDT AND MM005A.LIFNR = MM012A.LIFNR ) MM005B ON MM005B.MANDT = CS111A.MANDT AND MM005B.LGORT = CS111A.BSU, SAPHEE.ZCST101 CS101A, SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028D, SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028E, SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028F, SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028G, SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 MASTER02A, SAPHEE.ZCST121 CS121A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB010A WHERE CS122A.MANDT = CS111A.MANDT AND CS122A.MANDT = CS101A.MANDT AND CS122A.MANDT = MM028D.MANDT AND CS122A.MANDT = MM028E.MANDT AND CS122A.MANDT = MM028F.MANDT AND CS122A.MANDT = MM028G.MANDT AND CS122A.MANDT = MASTER02A.MANDT -- AND CS122A.CS122_UPN = CS111A.UPN -- AND CS122A.CS122_CST = CS111A.CST AND CS122A.CS122_PJT = CS111A.PJT AND CS122A.CS122_PJT = CS101A.CS101_PJT AND CS122A.CS122_PJT = MASTER02A.POSID AND CS122A.CS122_HNO = CS111A.HNO AND CS122A.CS122_HNO = CS101A.CS101_HNO AND (CS122A.CS122_PJT || CS122A.CS122_HNO) = MASTER02A.POSID_1 AND CS122A.MANDT = CS121A.MANDT AND CS122A.CS122_UPN = CS121A.CS121_UPN AND CS122A.CS122_CST = CS121A.CS121_CST AND CS101A.CS101_ARA = MM028D.CODE2 AND CS101A.CS101_AGB = MM028E.CODE2 AND CS101A.CS101_ABG = MM028F.CODE2 AND CS111A.MANDT = WB010A.MANDT AND CS111A.BSU = WB010A.LGORT AND WB010A.LGORT > '' AND MM028D.CODE1 = 'CS115' AND MM028E.CODE1 = 'CS116' AND MM028F.CODE1 = 'CS112' AND MM028G.CODE1 = 'CS120' AND MM028D.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028E.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028F.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028G.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028G.CODE2 = 'B4' AND CS122A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS122A.CS122_UPN = #UPN# AND CS122A.CS122_CST = #CST# AND CS126D.USD > ''
AND SUBSTR(CS122A.CS122_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W')
AND SUBSTR(CS122A.CS122_HNO,1,1) IN ('J')
AND SUBSTR(CS122A.CS122_HNO,1,1) IN ('G')
AND SUBSTR(CS122A.CS122_HNO,1,1) IN ('F')
